Relevant Information to be Included: Gliomasphere cell lines cultured in Neurobasal Medium with supplements
Cells depleted for CD45+ inflammatory cells
Single cells sorted from glioblastoma patients and established cell lines
Gliomasphere cell lines differentiated using serum
Final Response: Glioblastoma cells derived from gliomasphere cell lines depleted for CD45+-cells. These cells were cultured in Neurobasal Medium supplemented with B27, N2, and EGF/FGF, and were differentiated by transitioning to DMEM with 10% FCS for 7 days.
